title: #CableCollection.CableCollection
copyright: Copyright 2014-2024 DMTF. For the full DMTF copyright policy, see http://www.dmtf.org/about/policies/copyright

anyOf.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used for references to a resource.

@odata.id.description: The unique identifier for a resource.
@odata.id.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the unique identifier for the resource and it shall be of the form defined in the Redfish specification.

anyOf.longDescription: This resource shall represent a resource collection of `Cable` instances for a Redfish implementation.

@odata.context.description: The OData description of a payload.
@odata.context.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the context URL that describes the resource according to OData-Protocol and shall be of the form defined in the Redfish specification.

@odata.etag.description: The current ETag of the resource.
@odata.etag.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a string that is defined by the ETag HTTP header definition in RFC7232.

@odata.type.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a URI fragment that specifies the type of the resource and it shall be of the form defined in the Redfish specification.

anyOf.description: The description of this resource.  Used for commonality in the schema definitions.
anyOf.longDescription: This property shall contain the description of this resource.  The value shall conform with the 'Description' clause of the Redfish Specification.

Members.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to the members of this collection.

items.description: The `Cable` schema contains properties that describe a cable connecting endpoints of a chassis, port, or any other cable-compatible endpoint.
items.longDescription: This resource contains a simple cable for a Redfish implementation.

anyOf.description: The `Cable` schema contains properties that describe a cable connecting endpoints of a chassis, port, or any other cable-compatible endpoint.
anyOf.longDescription: This resource contains a simple cable for a Redfish implementation.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Assembly.description: The link to the assembly associated with this cable.
Assembly.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type `Assembly`.

AssetTag.description: The user-assigned asset tag for this cable.
AssetTag.longDescription: This property shall track the cable for inventory purposes.

CableClass.description: The identifier for the downstream resource.
CableClass.longDescription: The property shall contain the cable class for this cable.

enumDescriptions.Fabric: This cable is used for connecting to a fabric.
enumDescriptions.Fan: This cable is used for connecting to a fan system.
enumDescriptions.General: This cable is used for providing general connectivity.
enumDescriptions.Network: This cable is used for connecting to a networking system.
enumDescriptions.PCIe: This cable is used for connecting to a PCIe endpoint.
enumDescriptions.Power: This cable is used for connecting to a power system.
enumDescriptions.Serial: This cable is used for connecting to a serial endpoint.
enumDescriptions.Storage: This cable is used for connecting to a storage system.
enumDescriptions.USB: This cable is used for connecting to a USB endpoint.
enumDescriptions.Video: This cable is used for connecting to a video system.

CableStatus.description: The user-reported status of this resource.
CableStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the user-reported status of this resource.

CableType.longDescription: This property shall contain a user-defined type for this cable.

DownstreamConnectorTypes.description: The connector types this cable supports.
DownstreamConnectorTypes.longDescription: The property shall contain an array of connector types this cable supports.

enumDescriptions.ACPower: This cable connects to an AC power connector.
enumDescriptions.DB9: This cable connects to a DB9 connector.
enumDescriptions.DCPower: This cable connects to a DC power connector.
enumDescriptions.DisplayPort: This cable connects to a DisplayPort power connector.
enumDescriptions.HDMI: This cable connects to an HDMI connector.
enumDescriptions.ICI: This cable connects to an ICI connector.
enumDescriptions.IPASS: This cable connects to an IPASS connector.
enumDescriptions.PCIe: This cable connects to a PCIe connector.
enumDescriptions.Proprietary: This cable connects to a proprietary connector.
enumDescriptions.QSFP: This cable connects to a QSFP connector.
enumDescriptions.RJ45: This cable connects to an RJ45 connector.
enumDescriptions.SATA: This cable connects to a SATA connector.
enumDescriptions.SCSI: This cable connects to a SCSI connector.
enumDescriptions.SFP: This cable connects to an SFP connector.
enumDescriptions.SFPPlus: This cable connects to an SFPPlus connector.
enumDescriptions.SlimSAS: This cable connects to a SlimSAS connector.
enumDescriptions.USBA: This cable connects to a USB-A connector.
enumDescriptions.USBC: This cable connects to a USB-C connector.

DownstreamName.description: The identifier for the downstream resource.
DownstreamName.longDescription: This property shall contain any identifier for a downstream resource.

LengthMeters.description: The length of the cable in meters.
LengthMeters.longDescription: This property shall contain the length of the cable in meters.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Location.longDescription: This property shall contain the location information of the associated assembly.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the organization responsible for producing the cable.  This organization might be the entity from whom the cable is purchased, but this is not necessarily true.

Model.description: The model number of the cable.
Model.longDescription: This property shall contain the name by which the manufacturer generally refers to the cable.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PartNumber.description: The part number for this cable.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the part number assigned by the organization that is responsible for producing or manufacturing the cable.

SKU.longDescription: This property shall contain the stock-keeping unit (SKU) number for this cable.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this cable.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the manufacturer-allocated number that identifies the cable.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

UpstreamConnectorTypes.description: The connector types this cable supports.
UpstreamConnectorTypes.longDescription: The property shall contain an array of connector types this cable supports.

UpstreamName.description: The identifier for the downstream resource.
UpstreamName.longDescription: This property shall contain any identifier for an upstream resource.

UserDescription.longDescription: This property shall contain a user-defined description for this cable.

Vendor.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the company that provides the final product that includes this cable.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Members@odata.count.description: The number of items in a collection.
Members@odata.count.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an integer representing the number of items in a collection.

Members@odata.nextLink.description: The URI to the resource containing the next set of partial members.
